about_the_game:
Dive into the gripping prologue of SCP Operations with this demo, offering a sneak peek into the intense world of the SCP Foundation. As commander of a Mobile Task Force, you’ll lead a team of four elite agents on a critical mission to thwart the Chaos Insurgency, a rogue faction determined to sabotage the Foundation’s efforts.


In this demo, you’ll experience the first chapter of the game, featuring a blend of tactical, turn-based combat and exploration across eerie environments filled with mysterious SCP objects. Customize your squad’s abilities, gear, and strategies as you face off against formidable enemies and unravel the conspiracy that threatens global security.


Whether you're a fan of the SCP universe or a newcomer to its horrors, this demo will immerse you in a world of intrigue, danger, and strategic depth. Prepare your team, confront the unknown, and set the stage for an epic battle that spans the globe.

content_descriptors.notes: The player fights against the enemy army and fictional creatures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Experience the thrilling prologue of SCP Operations in this exclusive demo. Command your elite MTF squad, encounter mysterious SCPs, and confront the Chaos Insurgency. Dive into the action and uncover the secrets that set the stage for the full game.
